1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Attribute name.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Attr.AttrName
6  ( AttrName (..),
7    isAttrNameRelmap,
8    attrNameText, attrNameCode,
9    attrNameTrunk,
10  ) where
11
12-- | Attribute name of relmap.
13data AttrName
14    = AttrNormal       String  -- ^ Normal attribute
15    | AttrRelmapNormal String  -- ^ Attribute for submap
16    | AttrRelmapLocal  String  -- ^ Attribute for submap with local relation references
17      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
18
19-- | Test attribute name is for subrelmap.
20isAttrNameRelmap :: AttrName -> Bool
21isAttrNameRelmap (AttrRelmapNormal _)  = True
22isAttrNameRelmap (AttrRelmapLocal  _)  = True
23isAttrNameRelmap _                     = False
24
25-- | String part of attribute names.
26attrNameText :: AttrName -> String
27attrNameText (AttrNormal       n)  = n
28attrNameText (AttrRelmapNormal n)  = n
29attrNameText (AttrRelmapLocal  n)  = n
30
31-- | Attribute string with hyphen.
32attrNameCode :: AttrName -> String
33attrNameCode = ('-':) . attrNameText
34
35-- | Constant for attribute name @\@trunk@.
36attrNameTrunk :: AttrName
37attrNameTrunk = AttrNormal "@trunk"
38
